entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
